techmeme.title: Reddit reports Q1 revenue up 61% YoY to $392M, vs. $370M est., and global daily active uniques up 31% to 108.1M; RDDT jumps 15%+ after hours on strong guidance (Jonathan Vanian/CNBC)
Amazon reports Q1 ad revenue up 18% YoY to $13.92B, vs. $13.74B est., and subscription services revenue up 9% YoY to $11.72B (Jonathan Vanian/CNBC)
Amazon reports Q1 AWS revenue up 17% YoY to $29.3B, vs. $29.42B est., and AWS operating income up 23% YoY to $11.55B (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
Amazon reports Q1 revenue up 9% YoY to $155.7B, operating income of $18.4B, up from $15.3B in Q1 2024, and net income of $17.1B, up from $10.4B in Q1 2024 (Amazon.com, Inc.)
Uber and autonomous vehicle operator May Mobility partner to deploy "thousands" of robotaxis across the US, starting in Arlington, Texas, by the end of 2025 (Andrew J. Hawkins/The Verge)
